question1.question: What types of appliances do you repair?
question1.answer: We repair all types of appliances, including washing machines, refrigerators, dishwashers, microwaves, and more.

question2.question: Can I get a free repair estimate?
question2.answer: Yes, we offer a free repair estimate. Just contact us, and we will provide you with a consultation.

question3.question: How quickly can you complete the repair?
question3.answer: The repair time depends on the type of appliance and the complexity of the issue. We usually aim to complete repairs within 1-3 days.

question4.question: Do you provide a warranty on the work done?
question4.answer: Yes, we provide a warranty on all work performed and parts replaced. The warranty is valid for 6 months.

testimonial1.name: Ivan Petrov
testimonial1.feedback: Very satisfied with the service! The technician arrived quickly and repaired my refrigerator. I highly recommend it to everyone!

testimonial2.name: Olena Kovalenko
testimonial2.feedback: The washing machine works like new! I appreciate your promptness and quality of service.

testimonial3.name: Mykola Ivanchuk
testimonial3.feedback: The best service in the city! Everything was clear, fast, and at a reasonable price.
